attributes.action: Leave the EU (incl. the Customs Union and Single Market)
attributes.additional_details:
Should the United Kingdom remain a member of the European Union or leave the European Union?

Leave = 17,410,742
Remain = 161,141,241

The United Kingdom consists of England, Northern Ireland, Scotland and Wales
attributes.background: To serve as a reminder to Parliament that 17.4 million citizens voted in favour of the UK leaving the European Union. We voted for full severance of the UK's membership with the EU, inclusive of the Customs Union and Single Market. We want sovereignty and the ability to control our own borders/laws
